name: Lightlike
description:
Lightlike is an abstract sci-fi puzzle microgame exploring a space of awe, wonder, and implausibility. Designed and developed across two weeks in 2016 by a three person team, we tried to provide "enough to understand, enough to not understand". Lightlike is inspired by Offscreen Colonies from the demogroup Conspiracy.

~ follow us at @MxAshlynn, @alfredofreak, and @haplessninny ~

"Intro synth arpeggio has always sounded straight out of space to me."
